Name: Gauntlet
About the game: Indie speed-run game with wall running, high octane gameplay, different weapons, enemies, explosions and much more, Use your ability to control your movement and try finishing the round as soon as possible, also try to kill as many enemies as possible. CONTROLS : WASD - Movement. Spacebar - Jump. Spacebar[2x] - Double Jump. Left Mouse Button - Fire. Right Mouse Button[HOLD] - Ability. Jump on a wall to - Enter wall run. Jump from a wall to - Exit wall run.
